title: ► American Horror Story: IT'S ALL CONNECTED!
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: This looks like the best illuminati video I have ever seen lol
Loved the "Bloody Face is Dandy's therapist" theory! Never thought about that before!
The Infantata looks ironically a lot like meep from freakshow...

at 0:43, I would like to say that Vivien would most likely be their granddaughter?
Bet and Dots child (child 1)- born 1947
child 1 has Vivien -probably around 1970?
That would make Vivien about 40 when the show started, which could be pretty accurate since she would be old enough to be a mother of a teenager.
Nice bits of connecting the dots there. Very dramatic outro. lol
description:
AMERICAN HORROR STORY creator Ryan Murphy confirms what fans have long speculated: every season is connected! But how? What are the ongoing theories? See it.

How do you think the seasons are connected? Tell us in the comments!
